meanings.definition: To fail to make a connection or to make an incorrect connection.
meanings.sent1: I kept misconnecting the puzzle pieces together.
meanings.sent2: The old phone charger kept misconnecting to my new device.
meanings.sent3: The robot kept misconnecting its wires, causing it to dance strangely.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts misconnected like tangled yarn, leading to confusion.
meanings.sent5: The misconnecting train tracks caused a chaotic mess at the station.

meanings.definition: The act of connecting incorrectly or unsuccessfully.
meanings.sent1: The misconnecting of the cables caused the computer to malfunction.
meanings.sent2: He fixed the misconnecting of the pipes to stop the leak.
meanings.sent3: The misconnecting of the dots in the painting created a unique pattern.
meanings.sent4: The misconnecting of ideas in the presentation led to a confusing message.
meanings.sent5: The misconnecting of the gears resulted in the machine's breakdown.
